_source: Based on FATF Methods and Trends publications
_note: These typologies are for Compliance mode. Detection mode uses weighted rule scoring without typologies.

typologies.name: Structuring (Smurfing)
typologies.description: Detects breaking up of transactions to avoid reporting thresholds. FATF ML Typology.

typologies.name: Account Takeover
typologies.description: Detects unauthorized access and fraudulent control of accounts.

typologies.name: Mule Account Activity
typologies.description: Detects accounts being used as intermediaries for money laundering.

typologies.name: Rapid Movement of Funds
typologies.description: Detects quick transfer of funds through accounts - layering indicator. FATF ML Typology.

typologies.name: Cash Intensive Business
typologies.description: Detects patterns typical of cash-based money laundering. FATF Recommendation 22.

typologies.name: Basic Fraud Detection
typologies.description: General fraud detection patterns for Detection mode fallback.
